FuncDef: The display ip routing-table label-stack command displays information about the label allocated to the LSP to which a BGP public-network IPv4 route recurses in a BGP free scenario.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a destination IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a mask length.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 32.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check information about the label allocated to the LSP to which a BGP public-network IPv4 route recurses in a BGP free scenario, run the display ip routing-table label-stack command.
